headline: A Fresh Look at 3M (MMM) Valuation as Shares Sustain Steady Momentum
summary: 3M (MMM) shares have edged slightly higher over the past week, continuing a steady trend that investors have been watching closely. With no clear news event driving the recent price movement, attention has shifted to long-term fundamentals and valuation. See our latest analysis for 3M. While 3M's latest share price movement grabbed some attention, the bigger story is the stock's overall trajectory. 3M is showing signs of momentum shifting upward, with a healthy year-to-date share price return...
